hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I came here to work royal jelly extract skin care I think it is sad that the Church is bowing to political correctness. I believe that women should not be bishops. Call me a bigot or whatever else you want but is to me fundamentally wrong to do this. I will defend the right of people to attend a church that allows this but those in favour please allow those of us who disagree our own rights to have beliefs of our own and not just follow blindly
